recipes.name: Zobo
recipes.description: A refreshing beverage made from dred hibiscus petals, boiled with spices and sweeteners.
recipes.imageAlt: A colorful purple drink made of hibiscus petals

recipes.name: Efo Riro
recipes.description: A rich stew from the Yoruba people, primarily consisting of spinach cooked with peppers, onions, and spices, often accompanied by meat or fish.
recipes.imageAlt: A vibrant green Efo Riro stew served with assorted meats and fish

Main.name: Cooked meat (goat meat or any preferred)

recipes.name: Moi Moi
recipes.description: A savory steamed pudding made from blended black-eyed peas.
recipes.imageAlt: A plate of Moi Moi served with sliced boiled eggs and a side of pepper sauce

Main.name: Peeled black-eyed peas or brown beans

recipes.name: Akara
recipes.description: Akara is a type of fritter made from cowpeas or beans (black-eyed peas) by the Yoruba people of Nigeria, Benin and Togo. It is also known as Bean cake.
recipes.imageAlt: A plate of golden brown Akara balls served with a spicy dipping sauce

recipes.name: Oha Stew
recipes.description: ​Oha Soup, also known as Ofe Oha or Ora Soup, is a traditional Igbo dish from southeastern Nigeria. ​
recipes.imageAlt: A bowl of Oha soup served with pounded yam

recipes.name: Okra and Stew
recipes.description: Okra soup (African okro soup) is made with okra vegetables cooked in a delicious mixture of palm oil, shrimp, goat meat, fish.
recipes.imageAlt: A bowl of Okra soup served with pounded yam

Main.name: Fresh okra, finely chopped or grated
Assorted meats (beef, goat meat, tripe, etc.)

recipes.name: Suya
recipes.description: A popular Hausa dish featuring grilled or roasted cow meat seasoned with a spicy pepper powder.
recipes.imageAlt: Grilled beef skewers covered in suya spice, served with onions and tomatoes

recipes.name: Palm Oil Stew
recipes.description: A spicy stew made by frying a blend of tomatoes, peppers, and onions in palm oil. ​
recipes.imageAlt: A bowl of palm oil stew with assorted meats and boiled eggs, served with rice

recipes.name: Jollof Rice and Chicken with Plantain
recipes.description: A popular West African dish made with rice, tomatoes, and spices, often served with fried plantains and chicken.
recipes.imageAlt: An colorful image of white fish with sweet potato and red onion toppings

recipes.name: Couscous
recipes.description: Algerian couscous is a traditional dish of steamed semolina topped with spiced meat, vegetables, and chickpeas.
recipes.imageAlt: A colorful algerian couscous dish with vegetables and meat

recipes.name: Lham Hlou
recipes.description: A sweet and fragrant Algerian dish made with tender meat, prunes, and cinnamon—traditionally served during Ramadan.
recipes.imageAlt: tender meat, prunes, and cinnamon

recipes.name: Mhalbi
recipes.description: A silky Algerian rice pudding delicately flavored with orange blossom water, often enjoyed during Eid and family gatherings.
recipes.imageAlt: A bowl of Mhalbi topped with cinnamon and nuts

recipes.name: Rechta
recipes.description: A traditional Algerian dish of handmade noodles served with chicken and a light white sauce, often prepared for celebrations
recipes.imageAlt: An colorful image of white fish with sweet potato and red onion toppings

recipes.name: Baklawa (Algerian)
recipes.description: A rich and flaky Algerian pastry made with layers of nuts and honey, often served during weddings and festive occasions.

recipes.name: Hmiss
recipes.description: A spicy Algerian pepper and tomato salad, grilled and mixed with olive oil—served as a starter or side dish, especially in summer.
recipes.imageAlt: An colorful image of white fish with sweet potato and red onion toppings

recipes.name: Chakhchoukha (Algerian)
recipes.description: A spicy Algerian pepper and tomato salad, grilled and mixed with olive oil—served as a starter or side dish, especially in summer
recipes.imageAlt: An colorful image of white fish with sweet potato and red onion toppings

recipes.name: Baghrir (Algerian Pancakes)
recipes.description: A traditional Algerian pancake with a spongy texture, often served with honey and butter.

recipes.name: Chakchouka (Algerian)
recipes.description: A flavorful Algerian dish made with sautéed tomatoes, peppers, and eggs, perfect for a comforting meal any time of day
recipes.imageAlt: A bowl of Chakchouka with poached eggs, served with crusty bread

recipes.name: Sambusa
recipes.description: Somali savory pastry filled with minced meat or vegetables and fried until crispy. Perfect as an appetizer or snack.
recipes.imageAlt: sambusa a savory pastry filled with meat or vegitables and spices

recipes.name: Bariis iyo Hilib

recipes.description: Somali cheesy bread or waffles, often eaten as a snack or breakfast with tea.

recipes.name: Sabaayad
recipes.description: Somali flatbread similar to paratha, soft and flaky, usually served with honey or stew.

recipes.name: Fuul
recipes.description: Mashed fava beans cooked with spices, often topped with olive oil and served with bread.

recipes.description: Mashed fava beans cooked with spices, often topped with olive oil and served with bread.
